title: Add 'aw mail ack' CLI command
description: AckMessage() client method exists but no CLI command exposes it. Add 'aw mail ack' subcommand that calls POST /v1/messages/{message_id}/ack. Takes --message-id flag.

title: Add 'aw lock renew' CLI command
description: ReservationRenew() client method exists but no CLI command exposes it. Add 'aw lock renew' subcommand that calls POST /v1/reservations/renew. Takes --resource-key and optional --ttl-seconds flags.

title: Add 'aw agents' CLI command
description: ListAgents() client method exists but no CLI command exposes it. Add 'aw agents' command that calls GET /v1/agents and outputs agent list as JSON. Response includes agent_id, alias, human_name, agent_type, status, last_seen, online.

title: Add ReservationRevoke() client method and 'aw lock revoke' CLI command
description: POST /v1/reservations/revoke endpoint has no Go client method. Add ReservationRevoke() to client library and 'aw lock revoke' CLI command. Request: {prefix (optional)}. Response: {revoked_count, revoked_keys}.

title: Update usage() help text with new commands
description: After adding agents, mail ack, lock renew, project, and lock revoke commands, update the usage() function in main.go to include them all.

title: Add GetCurrentProject() client method and 'aw project' CLI command
description: GET /v1/projects/current endpoint has no Go client method. Add GetCurrentProject() to client library and 'aw project' CLI command. Response: {project_id, slug, name}.
